headline: Public Affairs Officer at U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE)
summary: Media Specialist with over 24 years of experience in media relations, communication, crisis management, and community outreach. Managed media and community outreach programs across multiple media platforms including print, radio, TV, and web.

defaultPosition.description: Mr. Yglesias is responsible for ICE's external communications in support of the agency's mission and serves as the spokesman for the agency covering areas from Key West to Indian River County. He handles press inquiries, develops and distributes news releases and provides multimedia services. He is also a part of the South Florida Human Trafficking Task Force providing key communication strategies for local and state media outlets.
